column3: RPC call `setmocktime` checks for regtest network, but `SetMockTime` does not contain such check. When the user adds this argument on !regtest network, mocktime is thus set. Do you want it this way as this is a change to the current status quo where user is not allowed to set mocktime on !regtest networks?\n
@paveljanik Good catch! (though I have no opinion on whether this is a problem - we don't advertise the parameter anyhow)\n
I do not have a problem with this too.\nACK\n
